about.title: About Us
about.metaTitle: About Our Dog Training Team | Certified Professionals
about.metaDescription: Meet our team of certified dog trainers with 10+ years experience. Specializing in positive reinforcement and behavioral modification techniques.
about.intro: Professional dog trainers dedicated to strengthening the bond between you and your pet
about.story: With over a decade of experience, we've helped hundreds of dogs and their owners achieve harmony through positive training methods.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create well-balanced, happy dogs through compassionate, evidence-based training methods that respect both dog and owner.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We use positive reinforcement techniques backed by modern behavioral science to create lasting behavioral change.

services.title: Our Services
services.metaTitle: Dog Training Services | Training, Sitting & Adventures
services.metaDescription: Comprehensive dog services including obedience training, behavioral modification, pet sitting, and outdoor adventures. Custom programs available.

training.title: Dog Training
training.metaDescription: Expert dog training for puppies and adults. Obedience, behavior modification, socialization. Private and group sessions available.
training.description: Comprehensive training programs for puppies and adult dogs

sitting.title: Dog Sitting
sitting.metaTitle: Trusted Dog Sitting Services | Professional Pet Care
sitting.metaDescription: Reliable dog sitting services with experienced professionals. Safe, comfortable home-away-from-home care for your pet. Daily updates included.
sitting.description: Safe, comfortable care when you're away

adventures.title: Dog Adventures
adventures.metaTitle: Dog Adventure Services | Hiking & Outdoor Activities
adventures.metaDescription: Exciting outdoor adventures for your dog. Group hikes, beach trips, and nature exploration. Exercise, socialization, and fun combined.
